name: Highway Driver (Bl4ckSh33p-Soft)
description:
Highway Driver is a free to play racing game without randomized "surprise mechanics" where you can compete in global Leaderboards and unlock Achievements.

Drive on randomized highways with increasing difficulty and try to evade obstacles.

You can unlock new cars/skins, exhausts, horns and radio stations with gameplay and in one of many seasonal events.

There will be regular free content updates and new event items in addition to  some exclusive purchaseable items.
